Articles.Content: I know it is not coming anytime soon, but THIS TRILER IS AMAZING

Amazing promises and feature creep, awful development. Please stop trying to hype this game even more. The hype is way too much already anyway.

The final game will be a pay 2 win paradise. This trailer is not even rendered in real time, and the final game will look a low different.

Hilarious how the trailer is titled "imagine", because right now you can only imagine the game, or just play some unconnected tiny fragments of it.

Edited December 20, 2014 by Kinglet

Lots of hype and promises with little to nothing to show so far after long, long development and super high budget. I lost my faith in this project some time ago

Elite Dangerous had a much less money and time and its already out and well btw. I got basic package from my friend so I will play the beta and all, so we will see.

Still it's a very nice looking video.
